explains: adj. 有关纪律的，惩戒性的
wordGroup: disciplinary action 纪律处分；训练活动

sentences.en: He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他将因一起风流韵事而面对一场纪律听证会。

sentences.en: The soldiers were ordered to appear before a disciplinary council on charges of negligence.
sentences.cn: 士兵们被控玩忽职守，被要求接受纪律委员会审查。

sentences.en: Today, the social sciences are largely focused on disciplinary problems and internal scholarly debates, rather than on topics with external impact.
sentences.cn: 今天，社会科学主要关注学科问题和内部的学术争论，而不是讨论具有外部影响的话题。
